# MAVLink Common Message Set - Command Definitions
# Auto-generated from common.xml
# Reference: https://mavlink.io/en/messages/common.html
# Note: MAVLink uses LITTLE_ENDIAN byte order
#
# Commands are MAV_CMD_* entries sent via COMMAND_LONG (ID 76)
# Each command uses the COMMAND_LONG message format with 7 float parameters

# ============================================================================
# COMMAND_LONG (Generic) - Send any MAV_CMD with raw parameters
# Use this for commands not explicitly defined below
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> COMMAND_LONG LITTLE_ENDIAN "Send a MAVLink command with parameters"
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 0 65535 0 "MAV_CMD command ID"
    STATE MAV_CMD_NAV_WAYPOINT 16
    STATE MAV_CMD_NAV_RETURN_TO_LAUNCH 20
    STATE MAV_CMD_NAV_LAND 21
    STATE MAV_CMD_NAV_TAKEOFF 22
    STATE MAV_CMD_DO_SET_MODE 176
    STATE MAV_CMD_COMPONENT_ARM_DISARM 400
    STATE MAV_CMD_REQUEST_MESSAGE 512
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Parameter 1"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Parameter 2"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Parameter 3"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Parameter 4"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Parameter 5 (often Latitude)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Parameter 6 (often Longitude)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Parameter 7 (often Altitude)"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_WAYPOINT (MAV_CMD 16)
# Navigate to waypoint. This is intended for use in missions (for guided
# commands outside of missions use MAV_CMD_DO_REPOSITION).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_WAYPOINT LITTLE_ENDIAN "Navigate to waypoint. This is intended for use in missions (for guided commands outside of missio..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 16 16 16 "MAV_CMD_NAV_WAYPOINT"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER HOLD 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Hold time. (ignored by fixed wing, time to stay at waypoint for rotary wing)"
    UNITS "Seconds" s
  APPEND_PARAMETER ACCEPT_RADIUS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Acceptance radius (if the sphere with this radius is hit, the waypoint counts..."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER PASS_RADIUS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "0 to pass through the WP, if > 0 radius to pass by WP. Positive value for clo..."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Desired yaw angle at waypoint (rotary wing). NaN to use the current system ya..."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_LOITER_TIME (MAV_CMD 19)
# Loiter at the specified latitude, longitude and altitude for a certain
# amount of time. Multicopter vehicles stop at the point (within a
# vehicle-specific acceptance radius). Forward-only moving vehicles (e.g.
# fixed-wing) circle the point with the specified radius/direction. If the
# Heading Required parameter (2) is non-zero forward moving aircraft will
# only leave the loiter circle once heading towards the next waypoint.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_LOITER_TIME LITTLE_ENDIAN "Loiter at the specified latitude, longitude and altitude for a certain amount of time. Multicopte..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 19 19 19 "MAV_CMD_NAV_LOITER_TIME"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TIME 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Loiter time (only starts once Lat, Lon and Alt is reached)."
    UNITS "Seconds" s
  APPEND_PARAMETER HEADING_REQUIRED 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Leave loiter circle only when track heading towards the next waypoint (MAV_BO..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER RADIUS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Loiter radius around waypoint for forward-only moving vehicles (not multicopt..."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER XTRACK_LOCATION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Loiter circle exit location and/or path to next waypoint ('xtrack') for forwa..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Landing altitude (ground level in current frame)."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "Vehicle will land!"

    UNITS "Meters_per_second" m/s

# proceed to the next command until the desired altitude is reached.

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"

# ============================================================================
# NAV_LOITER_TO_ALT (MAV_CMD 31)
# Begin loiter at the specified Latitude and Longitude.  If Lat=Lon=0, then
# loiter at the current position.  Don't consider the navigation command
# complete (don't leave loiter) until the altitude has been reached.
# Additionally, if the Heading Required parameter is non-zero the aircraft
# will not leave the loiter until heading toward the next waypoint.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_LOITER_TO_ALT LITTLE_ENDIAN "Begin loiter at the specified Latitude and Longitude. If Lat=Lon=0, then loiter at the current po..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 31 31 31 "MAV_CMD_NAV_LOITER_TO_ALT"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER HEADING_REQUIRED 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Leave loiter circle only when track heading towards the next waypoint (MAV_BO..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER RADIUS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Loiter radius around waypoint for forward-only moving vehicles (not multicopt..."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER XTRACK_LOCATION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Loiter circle exit location and/or path to next waypoint ('xtrack') for forwa..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE_MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude mode: 0: Keep current altitude, 1: keep altitude difference to targe..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude above home. (used if mode=2)"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TIME_TO_LAND 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Time to land in which the MAV should go to the default position hold mode aft..."
    UNITS "Seconds" s
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_FOLLOW_REPOSITION (MAV_CMD 33)
# Reposition the MAV after a follow target command has been sent
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_FOLLOW_REPOSITION LITTLE_ENDIAN "Reposition the MAV after a follow target command has been sent"
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 33 33 33 "MAV_CMD_DO_FOLLOW_REPOSITION"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CAMERA_Q1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Camera q1 (where 0 is on the ray from the camera to the tracking device)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CAMERA_Q2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Camera q2"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CAMERA_Q3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Camera q3"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CAMERA_Q4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Camera q4"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE_OFFSET 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "altitude offset from target"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER X_OFFSET 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "X offset from target"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER Y_OFFSET 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Y offset from target"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_ORBIT (MAV_CMD 34)
# Start orbiting on the circumference of a circle defined by the parameters.
# Setting values to NaN/INT32_MAX (as appropriate) results in using
# defaults.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_ORBIT LITTLE_ENDIAN "Start orbiting on the circumference of a circle defined by the parameters. Setting values to NaN/..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 34 34 34 "MAV_CMD_DO_ORBIT"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER RADIUS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Radius of the circle. Positive: orbit clockwise. Negative: orbit counter-cloc..."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER VELOCITY 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Tangential Velocity. NaN: Use vehicle default velocity, or current velocity i..."
    UNITS "Meters_per_second" m/s
  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW_BEHAVIOR 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Yaw behavior of the vehicle."
    STATE ORBIT_YAW_BEHAVIOUR_HOLD_FRONT_TO_CIRCLE_CENTER 0
    STATE ORBIT_YAW_BEHAVIOUR_HOLD_INITIAL_HEADING 1
    STATE ORBIT_YAW_BEHAVIOUR_UNCONTROLLED 2
    STATE ORBIT_YAW_BEHAVIOUR_HOLD_FRONT_TANGENT_TO_CIRCLE 3
    STATE ORBIT_YAW_BEHAVIOUR_RC_CONTROLLED 4
    STATE ORBIT_YAW_BEHAVIOUR_UNCHANGED 5
  APPEND_PARAMETER ORBITS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0 "Orbit around the centre point for this many radians (i.e. for a three-quarter..."
    UNITS "Radians" rad
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE_X 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Center point latitude (if no MAV_FRAME specified) / X coordinate according to..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE_Y 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Center point longitude (if no MAV_FRAME specified) / Y coordinate according t..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE_Z 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Center point altitude (MSL) (if no MAV_FRAME specified) / Z coordinate accord..."
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_FIGURE_EIGHT (MAV_CMD 35)
# Fly a figure eight path as defined by the parameters.
# Set parameters to NaN/INT32_MAX (as appropriate) to use system-default
# values.
# The command is intended for fixed wing vehicles (and VTOL hybrids flying
# in fixed-wing mode), allowing POI tracking for gimbals that don't support
# infinite rotation.
# This command only defines the flight path. Speed should be set
# independently (use e.g. MAV_CMD_DO_CHANGE_SPEED).
# Yaw and other degrees of freedom are not specified, and will be
# flight-stack specific (on vehicles where they can be controlled
# independent of the heading).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_FIGURE_EIGHT LITTLE_ENDIAN "Fly a figure eight path as defined by the parameters. Set parameters to NaN/INT32_MAX (as appropr..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 35 35 35 "MAV_CMD_DO_FIGURE_EIGHT"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER MAJOR_RADIUS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Major axis radius of the figure eight. Positive: orbit the north circle clock..."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER MINOR_RADIUS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Minor axis radius of the figure eight. Defines the radius of the two circles ..."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER ORIENTATION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Orientation of the figure eight major axis with respect to true north (range:..."
    UNITS "Radians" rad
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE_X 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Center point latitude/X coordinate according to MAV_FRAME. If no MAV_FRAME sp..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE_Y 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Center point longitude/Y coordinate according to MAV_FRAME. If no MAV_FRAME s..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE_Z 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Center point altitude MSL/Z coordinate according to MAV_FRAME. If no MAV_FRAM..."
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_ROI (MAV_CMD 80)
# Sets the region of interest (ROI) for a sensor set or the vehicle itself.
# This can then be used by the vehicle's control system to control the
# vehicle attitude and the attitude of various sensors such as cameras.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_ROI LITTLE_ENDIAN "Sets the region of interest (ROI) for a sensor set or the vehicle itself. This can then be used b..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 80 80 80 "MAV_CMD_NAV_ROI"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ROI_MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Region of interest mode."
    STATE MAV_ROI_NONE 0
    STATE MAV_ROI_WPNEXT 1
    STATE MAV_ROI_WPINDEX 2
    STATE MAV_ROI_LOCATION 3
    STATE MAV_ROI_TARGET 4
  APPEND_PARAMETER WP_INDEX 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Waypoint index/ target ID. (see MAV_ROI enum)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ROI_INDEX 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "ROI index (allows a vehicle to manage multiple ROI's)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER X 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "x the location of the fixed ROI (see MAV_FRAME)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER Y 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "y"
  APPEND_PARAMETER Z 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "z"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER GLOBAL_CTRL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "0: Disable full path planning (without resetting map), 1: Enable, 2: Enable a..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Yaw angle at goal"
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE_X 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude/X of goal"

# ============================================================================
# NAV_VTOL_TAKEOFF (MAV_CMD 84)

# support both VTOL and fixed-wing flight (multicopters, boats,etc.).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_VTOL_TAKEOFF LITTLE_ENDIAN "Takeoff from ground using VTOL mode, and transition to forward flight with specified heading. The..."

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TRANSITION_HEADING 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Front transition heading."
    STATE VTOL_TRANSITION_HEADING_VEHICLE_DEFAULT 0
    STATE VTOL_TRANSITION_HEADING_NEXT_WAYPOINT 1
    STATE VTOL_TRANSITION_HEADING_TAKEOFF 2
    STATE VTOL_TRANSITION_HEADING_SPECIFIED 3
    STATE VTOL_TRANSITION_HEADING_ANY 4
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW_ANGLE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Yaw angle. NaN to use the current system yaw heading mode (e.g. yaw towards n..."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_PAYLOAD_PLACE (MAV_CMD 94)
# Descend and place payload. Vehicle moves to specified location, descends
# until it detects a hanging payload has reached the ground, and then
# releases the payload. If ground is not detected before the reaching the
# maximum descent value (param1), the command will complete without
# releasing the payload.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_PAYLOAD_PLACE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Descend and place payload. Vehicle moves to specified location, descends until it detects a hangi..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 94 94 94 "MAV_CMD_NAV_PAYLOAD_PLACE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER MAX_DESCENT 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Maximum distance to descend."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 177 177 177 "MAV_CMD_DO_JUMP"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER NUMBER 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Sequence number"
  APPEND_PARAMETER REPEAT 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Repeat count"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_CHANGE_SPEED (MAV_CMD 178)
# Change speed and/or throttle set points. The value persists until it is
# overridden or there is a mode change
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_CHANGE_SPEED LITTLE_ENDIAN "Change speed and/or throttle set points. The value persists until it is overridden or there is a ..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 178 178 178 "MAV_CMD_DO_CHANGE_SPEED"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER SPEED_TYPE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Speed type of value set in param2 (such as airspeed, ground speed, and so on)"
    STATE SPEED_TYPE_AIRSPEED 0
    STATE SPEED_TYPE_GROUNDSPEED 1
    STATE SPEED_TYPE_CLIMB_SPEED 2
    STATE SPEED_TYPE_DESCENT_SPEED 3
  APPEND_PARAMETER SPEED 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Speed (-1 indicates no change, -2 indicates return to default vehicle speed)"
    UNITS "Meters_per_second" m/s
  APPEND_PARAMETER THROTTLE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Throttle (-1 indicates no change, -2 indicates return to default vehicle thro..."
    UNITS "Percent" %
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_HOME (MAV_CMD 179)
# Sets the home position to either to the current position or a specified
# position.
# The home position is the default position that the system will return to
# and land on.
# The position is set automatically by the system during the takeoff (and
# may also be set using this command).
# Note: the current home position may be emitted in a HOME_POSITION message
# on request (using MAV_CMD_REQUEST_MESSAGE with param1=242).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_HOME LITTLE_ENDIAN "Sets the home position to either to the current position or a specified position. The home positi..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 179 179 179 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_HOME"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER USE_CURRENT 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Use current location (MAV_BOOL_FALSE: use specified location). Values not equ..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ROLL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Roll angle (of surface). Range: -180..180 degrees. NAN or 0 means value not s..."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER PITCH 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Pitch angle (of surface). Range: -90..90 degrees. NAN or 0 means value not se..."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Yaw angle. NaN to use default heading. Range: -180..180 degrees."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_FLIGHTTERMINATION (MAV_CMD 185)
# Terminate flight immediately.
# Flight termination immediately and irreversibly terminates the current
# flight, returning the vehicle to ground.
# The vehicle will ignore RC or other input until it has been power-cycled.
# Termination may trigger safety measures, including: disabling motors and
# deployment of parachute on multicopters, and setting flight surfaces to
# initiate a landing pattern on fixed-wing).
# On multicopters without a parachute it may trigger a crash landing.
# Support for this command can be tested using the protocol bit:
# MAV_PROTOCOL_CAPABILITY_FLIGHT_TERMINATION.
# Support for this command can also be tested by sending the command with
# param1=0 (< 0.5); the ACK should be either MAV_RESULT_FAILED or
# MAV_RESULT_UNSUPPORTED.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_FLIGHTTERMINATION LITTLE_ENDIAN "Terminate flight immediately. Flight termination immediately and irreversibly terminates the curr..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 185 185 185 "MAV_CMD_DO_FLIGHTTERMINATION"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TERMINATE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Flight termination activated if > 0.5. Otherwise not activated and ACK with M..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "This will terminate flight immediately!"

    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_ACTUATOR (MAV_CMD 187)
# Sets actuators (e.g. servos) to a desired value. The actuator numbers are
# mapped to specific outputs (e.g. on any MAIN or AUX PWM or UAVCAN) using a
# flight-stack specific mechanism (i.e. a parameter).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_ACTUATOR LITTLE_ENDIAN "Sets actuators (e.g. servos) to a desired value. The actuator numbers are mapped to specific outp..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 187 187 187 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_ACTUATOR"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Actuator 1 value, scaled from [-1 to 1]. NaN to ignore."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Actuator 2 value, scaled from [-1 to 1]. NaN to ignore."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Actuator 3 value, scaled from [-1 to 1]. NaN to ignore."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Actuator 4 value, scaled from [-1 to 1]. NaN to ignore."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Actuator 5 value, scaled from [-1 to 1]. NaN to ignore."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Actuator 6 value, scaled from [-1 to 1]. NaN to ignore."
  APPEND_PARAMETER INDEX 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Index of actuator set (i.e if set to 1, Actuator 1 becomes Actuator 7)"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "This command may cause vehicle movement!"

# ============================================================================
# DO_RETURN_PATH_START (MAV_CMD 188)
# Mission item to specify the start of a failsafe/landing return-path
# segment (the end of the segment is the next MAV_CMD_DO_LAND_START item).
# A vehicle that is using missions for landing (e.g. in a return mode) will
# join the mission on the closest path of the return-path segment (instead
# of MAV_CMD_DO_LAND_START or the nearest waypoint).
# The main use case is to minimize the failsafe flight path in corridor
# missions, where the inbound/outbound paths are constrained (by geofences)
# to the same particular path.
# The MAV_CMD_NAV_RETURN_PATH_START would be placed at the start of the
# return path.
# If a failsafe occurs on the outbound path the vehicle will move to the
# nearest point on the return path (which is parallel for this kind of
# mission), effectively turning round and following the shortest path to
# landing.
# If a failsafe occurs on the inbound path the vehicle is already on the
# return segment and will continue to landing.
# The Latitude/Longitude/Altitude are optional, and may be set to 0 if not
# needed.
# If specified, the item defines the waypoint at which the return segment
# starts.
# If sent using as a command, the vehicle will perform a mission landing
# (using the land segment if defined) or reject the command if mission
# landings are not supported, or no mission landing is defined. When used as
# a command any position information in the command is ignored.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_RETURN_PATH_START LITTLE_ENDIAN "Mission item to specify the start of a failsafe/landing return-path segment (the end of the segme..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 188 188 188 "MAV_CMD_DO_RETURN_PATH_START"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitudee. 0: not used."
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitudee. 0: not used."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitudee. 0: not used."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_LAND_START (MAV_CMD 189)
# Mission item to mark the start of a mission landing pattern, or a command
# to land with a mission landing pattern.
# When used in a mission, this is a marker for the start of a sequence of
# mission items that represent a landing pattern.
# It should be followed by a navigation item that defines the first waypoint
# of the landing sequence.
# The start marker positional params are used only for selecting what
# landing pattern to use if several are defined in the mission (the selected
# pattern will be the one with the marker position that is closest to the
# vehicle when a landing is commanded).
# If the marker item position has zero-values for latitude, longitude, and
# altitude, then landing pattern selection is instead based on the position
# of the first waypoint in the landing sequence.
# When sent as a command it triggers a landing using a mission landing
# pattern.
# The location parameters are not used in this case, and should be set to 0.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_LAND_START LITTLE_ENDIAN "Mission item to mark the start of a mission landing pattern, or a command to land with a mission ..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 189 189 189 "MAV_CMD_DO_LAND_START"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude for landing sequence selection, or 0 (see description). Ignored in c..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude for landing sequence selection, or 0 (see description). Ignored in ..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude for landing sequence selection, or 0 (see description). Ignored in c..."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================

    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER SPEED 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Landing speed"
    UNITS "Meters_per_second" m/s
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_REPOSITION (MAV_CMD 192)
# Reposition the vehicle to a specific WGS84 global position. This command
# is intended for guided commands (for missions use MAV_CMD_NAV_WAYPOINT
# instead).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_REPOSITION LITTLE_ENDIAN "Reposition the vehicle to a specific WGS84 global position. This command is intended for guided c..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 192 192 192 "MAV_CMD_DO_REPOSITION"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER SPEED 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Ground speed, less than 0 (-1) for default"
    UNITS "Meters_per_second" m/s
  APPEND_PARAMETER BITMASK 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Bitmask of option flags."
  APPEND_PARAMETER RADIUS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Loiter radius for planes. Positive values only, direction is controlled by Ya..."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Yaw heading (heading reference defined in Bitmask field). NaN to use the curr..."
    UNITS "Radians" rad
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_PAUSE_CONTINUE (MAV_CMD 193)
# If in a GPS controlled position mode, hold the current position or
# continue.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_PAUSE_CONTINUE LITTLE_ENDIAN "If in a GPS controlled position mode, hold the current position or continue."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 193 193 193 "MAV_CMD_DO_PAUSE_CONTINUE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONTINUE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Continue mission (MAV_BOOL_TRUE), Pause current mission or reposition command..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_ROI_LOCATION (MAV_CMD 195)
# Sets the region of interest (ROI) to a location. This can then be used by
# the vehicle's control system to control the vehicle attitude and the
# attitude of various sensors such as cameras. This command can be sent to a
# gimbal manager but not to a gimbal device. A gimbal is not to react to
# this message.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_ROI_LOCATION LITTLE_ENDIAN "Sets the region of interest (ROI) to a location. This can then be used by the vehicle's control s..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 195 195 195 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_ROI_LOCATION"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER GIMBAL_DEVICE_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Component ID of gimbal device to address (or 1-6 for non-MAVLink gimbal), 0 f..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude of ROI location"
    UNITS "Degrees_E7" degE7
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude of ROI location"
    UNITS "Degrees_E7" degE7
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude of ROI location"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_ROI_WPNEXT_OFFSET (MAV_CMD 196)
# Sets the region of interest (ROI) to be toward next waypoint, with
# optional pitch/roll/yaw offset. This can then be used by the vehicle's
# control system to control the vehicle attitude and the attitude of various
# sensors such as cameras. This command can be sent to a gimbal manager but
# not to a gimbal device. A gimbal device is not to react to this message.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_ROI_WPNEXT_OFFSET LITTLE_ENDIAN "Sets the region of interest (ROI) to be toward next waypoint, with optional pitch/roll/yaw offset..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 196 196 196 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_ROI_WPNEXT_OFFSET"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER GIMBAL_DEVICE_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Component ID of gimbal device to address (or 1-6 for non-MAVLink gimbal), 0 f..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PITCH_OFFSET 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Pitch offset from next waypoint, positive pitching up"
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER ROLL_OFFSET 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Roll offset from next waypoint, positive rolling to the right"
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW_OFFSET 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Yaw offset from next waypoint, positive yawing to the right"
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_ROI_NONE (MAV_CMD 197)
# Cancels any previous ROI command returning the vehicle/sensors to default
# flight characteristics. This can then be used by the vehicle's control
# system to control the vehicle attitude and the attitude of various sensors
# such as cameras. This command can be sent to a gimbal manager but not to a
# gimbal device. A gimbal device is not to react to this message. After this
# command the gimbal manager should go back to manual input if available,
# and otherwise assume a neutral position.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_ROI_NONE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Cancels any previous ROI command returning the vehicle/sensors to default flight characteristics...."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 197 197 197 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_ROI_NONE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER GIMBAL_DEVICE_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Component ID of gimbal device to address (or 1-6 for non-MAVLink gimbal), 0 f..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# DO_SET_ROI_SYSID (MAV_CMD 198)

# gimbal device is not to react to this message.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_ROI_SYSID LITTLE_ENDIAN "Mount tracks system with specified system ID. Determination of target vehicle position may be don..."

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER SYSTEM_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "System ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER GIMBAL_DEVICE_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Component ID of gimbal device to address (or 1-6 for non-MAVLink gimbal), 0 f..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Camera ID (-1 for all)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TRANSMISSION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Transmission: 0: disabled, 1: enabled compressed, 2: enabled raw"
  APPEND_PARAMETER INTERVAL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Transmission mode: 0: video stream, >0: single images every n seconds"
    UNITS "Seconds" s
  APPEND_PARAMETER RECORDING 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Recording: 0: disabled, 1: enabled compressed, 2: enabled raw"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_ROI (MAV_CMD 201)
# Sets the region of interest (ROI) for a sensor set or the vehicle itself.
# This can then be used by the vehicle's control system to control the
# vehicle attitude and the attitude of various sensors such as cameras.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_ROI LITTLE_ENDIAN "Sets the region of interest (ROI) for a sensor set or the vehicle itself. This can then be used b..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 201 201 201 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_ROI"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ROI_MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Region of interest mode."
    STATE MAV_ROI_NONE 0
    STATE MAV_ROI_WPNEXT 1
    STATE MAV_ROI_WPINDEX 2
    STATE MAV_ROI_LOCATION 3
    STATE MAV_ROI_TARGET 4
  APPEND_PARAMETER WP_INDEX 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Waypoint index/ target ID (depends on param 1)."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ROI_INDEX 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Region of interest index. (allows a vehicle to manage multiple ROI's)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "MAV_ROI_WPNEXT: pitch offset from next waypoint, MAV_ROI_LOCATION: latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "MAV_ROI_WPNEXT: roll offset from next waypoint, MAV_ROI_LOCATION: longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "MAV_ROI_WPNEXT: yaw offset from next waypoint, MAV_ROI_LOCATION: altitude"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# DO_DIGICAM_CONFIGURE (MAV_CMD 202)
# Configure digital camera. This is a fallback message for systems that have
# not yet implemented PARAM_EXT_XXX messages and camera definition files
# (see https://mavlink.io/en/services/camera_def.html ).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_DIGICAM_CONFIGURE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Configure digital camera. This is a fallback message for systems that have not yet implemented PA..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 202 202 202 "MAV_CMD_DO_DIGICAM_CONFIGURE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Modes: P, TV, AV, M, Etc."
  APPEND_PARAMETER SHUTTER_SPEED 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Shutter speed: Divisor number for one second."
  APPEND_PARAMETER APERTURE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Aperture: F stop number."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ISO 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "ISO number e.g. 80, 100, 200, Etc."
  APPEND_PARAMETER EXPOSURE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Exposure type enumerator."
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND_IDENTITY 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Command Identity."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ENGINE_CUT_OFF 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Main engine cut-off time before camera trigger. (0 means no cut-off)"
    UNITS "ds" ds
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER ZOOM_RELATIVE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Zooming step value to offset zoom from the current position"
  APPEND_PARAMETER FOCUS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Focus Locking, Unlocking or Re-locking"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND_IDENTITY 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Command Identity"
  APPEND_PARAMETER SHOT_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Test shot identifier. If set to 1, image will only be captured, but not count..."
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_MOUNT_CONFIGURE (MAV_CMD 204)
# Mission command to configure a camera or antenna mount
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_MOUNT_CONFIGURE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Mission command to configure a camera or antenna mount"
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 204 204 204 "MAV_CMD_DO_MOUNT_CONFIGURE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Mount operation mode"
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_RETRACT 0
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_NEUTRAL 1
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_MAVLINK_TARGETING 2
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_RC_TARGETING 3
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_GPS_POINT 4
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_SYSID_TARGET 5
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_HOME_LOCATION 6
  APPEND_PARAMETER STABILIZE_ROLL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Stabilize roll (MAV_BOOL_TRUE). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."
  APPEND_PARAMETER STABILIZE_PITCH 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Stabilize pitch (MAV_BOOL_TRUE). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."
  APPEND_PARAMETER STABILIZE_YAW 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Stabilize yaw (MAV_BOOL_TRUE). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ROLL_INPUT_MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Roll input (0 = angle body frame, 1 = angular rate, 2 = angle absolute frame)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PITCH_INPUT_MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Pitch input (0 = angle body frame, 1 = angular rate, 2 = angle absolute frame)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW_INPUT_MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Yaw input (0 = angle body frame, 1 = angular rate, 2 = angle absolute frame)"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# Mission command to control a camera or antenna mount
# ============================================================================

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 205 205 205 "MAV_CMD_DO_MOUNT_CONTROL"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PITCH 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "pitch depending on mount mode (degrees or degrees/second depending on pitch i..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ROLL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "roll depending on mount mode (degrees or degrees/second depending on roll inp..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "yaw depending on mount mode (degrees or degrees/second depending on yaw input)."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "altitude depending on mount mode."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "latitude, set if appropriate mount mode."
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "longitude, set if appropriate mount mode."
  APPEND_PARAMETER MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Mount mode."
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_RETRACT 0
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_NEUTRAL 1
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_MAVLINK_TARGETING 2
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_RC_TARGETING 3
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_GPS_POINT 4
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_SYSID_TARGET 5
    STATE MAV_MOUNT_MODE_HOME_LOCATION 6
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_CAM_TRIGG_DIST (MAV_CMD 206)
# Mission command to set camera trigger distance for this flight. The camera
# is triggered each time this distance is exceeded. This command can also be
# used to set the shutter integration time for the camera.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_CAM_TRIGG_DIST LITTLE_ENDIAN "Mission command to set camera trigger distance for this flight. The camera is triggered each time..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 206 206 206 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_CAM_TRIGG_DIST"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER DISTANCE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Camera trigger distance. 0 to stop triggering."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER SHUTTER 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Camera shutter integration time. -1 or 0 to ignore"
    UNITS "Milliseconds" ms
  APPEND_PARAMETER TRIGGER 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Trigger camera once, immediately (MAV_BOOL_TRUE). Values not equal to 0 or 1 ..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras a..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_FENCE_ENABLE (MAV_CMD 207)
# Enable the geofence.
# This can be used in a mission or via the command protocol.
# The persistence/lifetime of the setting is undefined.
# Depending on flight stack implementation it may persist until superseded,
# or it may revert to a system default at the end of a mission.
# Flight stacks typically reset the setting to system defaults on reboot.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_FENCE_ENABLE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Enable the geofence. This can be used in a mission or via the command protocol. The persistence/l..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 207 207 207 "MAV_CMD_DO_FENCE_ENABLE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ENABLE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "enable? (0=disable, 1=enable, 2=disable_floor_only)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TYPES 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Fence types to enable or disable as a bitmask. 0: field is unused/all fences ..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_PARACHUTE (MAV_CMD 208)
# Mission item/command to release a parachute or enable/disable auto
# release.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_PARACHUTE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Mission item/command to release a parachute or enable/disable auto release."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 208 208 208 "MAV_CMD_DO_PARACHUTE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Action"
    STATE PARACHUTE_DISABLE 0
    STATE PARACHUTE_ENABLE 1
    STATE PARACHUTE_RELEASE 2
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "This will deploy the parachute!"

# ============================================================================
# DO_MOTOR_TEST (MAV_CMD 209)
# Command to perform motor test.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_MOTOR_TEST LITTLE_ENDIAN "Command to perform motor test."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 209 209 209 "MAV_CMD_DO_MOTOR_TEST"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER INSTANCE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Motor instance number (from 1 to max number of motors on the vehicle)."
  APPEND_PARAMETER THROTTLE_TYPE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Throttle type (whether the Throttle Value in param3 is a percentage, PWM valu..."
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_THROTTLE_PERCENT 0
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_THROTTLE_PWM 1
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_THROTTLE_PILOT 2
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_COMPASS_CAL 3
  APPEND_PARAMETER THROTTLE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Throttle value."
  APPEND_PARAMETER TIMEOUT 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Timeout between tests that are run in sequence."
    UNITS "Seconds" s
  APPEND_PARAMETER MOTOR_COUNT 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Motor count. Number of motors to test in sequence: 0/1=one motor, 2= two moto..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER TEST_ORDER 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Motor test order."
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_ORDER_DEFAULT 0
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_ORDER_SEQUENCE 1
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_ORDER_BOARD 2
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

    UNITS "Milliseconds" ms
  APPEND_PARAMETER SHUTTER_INTEGRATION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Camera shutter integration time. Should be less than trigger cycle time. -1 o..."
    UNITS "Milliseconds" ms
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras a..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER COLD_START 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Cold start engine (MAV_BOOL_FALSE: Warm start). Values not equal to 0 or 1 ar..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER HEIGHT_DELAY 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Height delay. This is for commanding engine start only after the vehicle has ..."
    UNITS "Meters" m

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_MISSION_CURRENT (MAV_CMD 224)
# Set the mission item with sequence number seq as the current item and emit
# MISSION_CURRENT (whether or not the mission number changed).
# If a mission is currently being executed, the system will continue to this
# new mission item on the shortest path, skipping any intermediate mission
# items.
# Note that mission jump repeat counters are not reset unless param2 is set
# (see MAV_CMD_DO_JUMP param2).
# This command may trigger a mission state-machine change on some systems:
# for example from MISSION_STATE_NOT_STARTED or MISSION_STATE_PAUSED to
# MISSION_STATE_ACTIVE.
# If the system is in mission mode, on those systems this command might
# therefore start, restart or resume the mission.
# If the system is not in mission mode this command must not trigger a
# switch to mission mode.
# The mission may be "reset" using param2.
# Resetting sets jump counters to initial values (to reset counters without
# changing the current mission item set the param1 to `-1`).
# Resetting also explicitly changes a mission state of
# MISSION_STATE_COMPLETE to MISSION_STATE_PAUSED or MISSION_STATE_ACTIVE,
# potentially allowing it to resume when it is (next) in a mission mode.
# The command will ACK with MAV_RESULT_FAILED if the sequence number is out
# of range (including if there is no mission item).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_MISSION_CURRENT LITTLE_ENDIAN "Set the mission item with sequence number seq as the current item and emit MISSION_CURRENT (wheth..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 224 224 224 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_MISSION_CURRENT"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER NUMBER 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Mission sequence value to set. -1 for the current mission item (use to reset ..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER RESET_MISSION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reset mission (MAV_BOOL_TRUE). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid. Resets..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_LAST (MAV_CMD 240)
# NOP - This command is only used to mark the upper limit of the DO commands
# in the enumeration
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_LAST LITTLE_ENDIAN "NOP - This command is only used to mark the upper limit of the DO commands in the enumeration"
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 240 240 240 "MAV_CMD_DO_LAST"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# PREFLIGHT_CALIBRATION (MAV_CMD 241)
# Trigger calibration. This command will be only accepted if in pre-flight
# mode. Except for Temperature Calibration, only one sensor should be set in
# a single message and all others should be zero.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> PREFLIGHT_CALIBRATION LITTLE_ENDIAN "Trigger calibration. This command will be only accepted if in pre-flight mode. Except for Tempera..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 241 241 241 "MAV_CMD_PREFLIGHT_CALIBRATION"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER GYRO_TEMPERATURE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "1: gyro calibration, 3: gyro temperature calibration"
  APPEND_PARAMETER MAGNETOMETER 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Magnetometer calibration. Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."
  APPEND_PARAMETER GROUND_PRESSURE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Ground pressure calibration. Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."
  APPEND_PARAMETER REMOTE_CONTROL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "1: radio RC calibration, 2: RC trim calibration"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ACCELEROMETER 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "1: accelerometer calibration, 2: board level calibration, 3: accelerometer te..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPMOT_OR_AIRSPEED 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "1: APM: compass/motor interference calibration (PX4: airspeed calibration, de..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ESC_OR_BARO 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "1: ESC calibration, 3: barometer temperature calibration"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# PREFLIGHT_SET_SENSOR_OFFSETS (MAV_CMD 242)
# Set sensor offsets. This command will be only accepted if in pre-flight

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER SENSOR_TYPE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Sensor to adjust the offsets for: 0: gyros, 1: accelerometer, 2: magnetometer..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER X_OFFSET 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "X axis offset (or generic dimension 1), in the sensor's raw units"
  APPEND_PARAMETER Y_OFFSET 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Y axis offset (or generic dimension 2), in the sensor's raw units"
  APPEND_PARAMETER Z_OFFSET 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Z axis offset (or generic dimension 3), in the sensor's raw units"
  APPEND_PARAMETER 4TH_DIMENSION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Generic dimension 4, in the sensor's raw units"
  APPEND_PARAMETER 5TH_DIMENSION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Generic dimension 5, in the sensor's raw units"
  APPEND_PARAMETER 6TH_DIMENSION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Generic dimension 6, in the sensor's raw units"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# PREFLIGHT_UAVCAN (MAV_CMD 243)
# Trigger UAVCAN configuration (actuator ID assignment and direction
# mapping). Note that this maps to the legacy UAVCAN v0 function
# UAVCAN_ENUMERATE, which is intended to be executed just once during
# initial vehicle configuration (it is not a normal pre-flight command and
# has been poorly named).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> PREFLIGHT_UAVCAN LITTLE_ENDIAN "Trigger UAVCAN configuration (actuator ID assignment and direction mapping). Note that this maps ..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 243 243 243 "MAV_CMD_PREFLIGHT_UAVCAN"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "1: Trigger actuator ID assignment and direction mapping. 0: Cancel command."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# PREFLIGHT_STORAGE (MAV_CMD 245)
# Request storage of different parameter values and logs. This command will
# be only accepted if in pre-flight mode.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> PREFLIGHT_STORAGE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Request storage of different parameter values and logs. This command will be only accepted if in ..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 245 245 245 "MAV_CMD_PREFLIGHT_STORAGE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAMETER_STORAGE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Action to perform on the persistent parameter storage"
    STATE PARAM_READ_PERSISTENT 0
    STATE PARAM_WRITE_PERSISTENT 1
    STATE PARAM_RESET_CONFIG_DEFAULT 2
    STATE PARAM_RESET_SENSOR_DEFAULT 3
    STATE PARAM_RESET_ALL_DEFAULT 4
  APPEND_PARAMETER MISSION_STORAGE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Action to perform on the persistent mission storage"
    STATE MISSION_READ_PERSISTENT 0
    STATE MISSION_WRITE_PERSISTENT 1
    STATE MISSION_RESET_DEFAULT 2
  APPEND_PARAMETER LOGGING_RATE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Onboard logging: 0: Ignore, 1: Start default rate logging, -1: Stop logging, ..."
    UNITS "Hertz" Hz
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# PREFLIGHT_REBOOT_SHUTDOWN (MAV_CMD 246)
# Request the reboot or shutdown of system components.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> PREFLIGHT_REBOOT_SHUTDOWN LITTLE_ENDIAN "Request the reboot or shutdown of system components."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 246 246 246 "MAV_CMD_PREFLIGHT_REBOOT_SHUTDOWN"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER AUTOPILOT 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Action to take for autopilot."
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_NONE 0
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_REBOOT 1
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_SHUTDOWN 2
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_REBOOT_TO_BOOTLOADER 3
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_POWER_ON 4
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPANION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Action to take for onboard computer."
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_NONE 0
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_REBOOT 1
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_SHUTDOWN 2
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_REBOOT_TO_BOOTLOADER 3
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_POWER_ON 4
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPONENT_ACTION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Action to take for component specified in param4."
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_NONE 0
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_REBOOT 1
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_SHUTDOWN 2
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_REBOOT_TO_BOOTLOADER 3
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_POWER_ON 4
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPONENT_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "MAVLink Component ID targeted in param3 (0 for all components)."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONDITIONS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Conditions under which reboot/shutdown is allowed."
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_CONDITIONS_SAFETY_INTERLOCKED 0
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_CONDITIONS_FORCE 20190226
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "WIP: ID (e.g. camera ID -1 for all IDs)"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "This will reboot or shutdown the system!"

# ============================================================================
# OVERRIDE_GOTO (MAV_CMD 252)
# Override current mission with command to pause mission, pause mission and
# move to position, continue/resume mission. When param 1 indicates that the
# mission is paused (MAV_GOTO_DO_HOLD), param 2 defines whether it holds in
# place or moves to another position.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> OVERRIDE_GOTO LITTLE_ENDIAN "Override current mission with command to pause mission, pause mission and move to position, conti..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 252 252 252 "MAV_CMD_OVERRIDE_GOTO"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONTINUE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "MAV_GOTO_DO_HOLD: pause mission and either hold or move to specified position..."
    STATE MAV_GOTO_DO_HOLD 0
    STATE MAV_GOTO_DO_CONTINUE 1
    STATE MAV_GOTO_HOLD_AT_CURRENT_POSITION 2
    STATE MAV_GOTO_HOLD_AT_SPECIFIED_POSITION 3
  APPEND_PARAMETER POSITION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "MAV_GOTO_HOLD_AT_CURRENT_POSITION: hold at current position, MAV_GOTO_HOLD_AT..."
    STATE MAV_GOTO_DO_HOLD 0
    STATE MAV_GOTO_DO_CONTINUE 1
    STATE MAV_GOTO_HOLD_AT_CURRENT_POSITION 2
    STATE MAV_GOTO_HOLD_AT_SPECIFIED_POSITION 3
  APPEND_PARAMETER FRAME 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Coordinate frame of hold point."
  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Desired yaw angle."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE_X 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude/X position."
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE_Y 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude/Y position."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE_Z 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude/Z position."
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "This command may cause vehicle movement!"

# ============================================================================
# OBLIQUE_SURVEY (MAV_CMD 260)
# Mission command to set a Camera Auto Mount Pivoting Oblique Survey
# (Replaces CAM_TRIGG_DIST for this purpose). The camera is triggered each
# time this distance is exceeded, then the mount moves to the next position.
# Params 4~6 set-up the angle limits and number of positions for oblique
# survey, where mount-enabled vehicles automatically roll the camera between
# shots to emulate an oblique camera setup (providing an increased HFOV).
# This command can also be used to set the shutter integration time for the
# camera.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> OBLIQUE_SURVEY LITTLE_ENDIAN "Mission command to set a Camera Auto Mount Pivoting Oblique Survey (Replaces CAM_TRIGG_DIST for t..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 260 260 260 "MAV_CMD_OBLIQUE_SURVEY"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER DISTANCE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Camera trigger distance. 0 to stop triggering."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER SHUTTER 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0 "Camera shutter integration time. 0 to ignore"
    UNITS "Milliseconds" ms
  APPEND_PARAMETER MIN_INTERVAL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0 "The minimum interval in which the camera is capable of taking subsequent pict..."
    UNITS "Milliseconds" ms
  APPEND_PARAMETER POSITIONS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Total number of roll positions at which the camera will capture photos (image..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ROLL_ANGLE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0 "Angle limits that the camera can be rolled to left and right of center."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER PITCH_ANGLE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0 "Fixed pitch angle that the camera will hold in oblique mode if the mount is a..."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_STANDARD_MODE (MAV_CMD 262)
# Enable the specified standard MAVLink mode.
# If the specified mode is not supported, the vehicle should ACK with
# MAV_RESULT_FAILED.
# See https://mavlink.io/en/services/standard_modes.html
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_STANDARD_MODE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Enable the specified standard MAVLink mode. If the specified mode is not supported, the vehicle s..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 262 262 262 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_STANDARD_MODE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER STANDARD_MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The mode to set."
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_NON_STANDARD 0
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_POSITION_HOLD 1
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_ORBIT 2
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_CRUISE 3
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_ALTITUDE_HOLD 4
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_SAFE_RECOVERY 5
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_MISSION 6
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_LAND 7
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_TAKEOFF 8
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER LAST_ITEM 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "last_item: the last mission item to run (after this item is run, the mission ..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

    HIDDEN

  HAZARDOUS "This command may cause vehicle movement!"

# ============================================================================
# ACTUATOR_TEST (MAV_CMD 310)
# Actuator testing command. This is similar to MAV_CMD_DO_MOTOR_TEST but
# operates on the level of output functions, i.e. it is possible to test
# Motor1 independent from which output it is configured on. Autopilots must
# NACK this command with MAV_RESULT_TEMPORARILY_REJECTED while armed.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> ACTUATOR_TEST LITTLE_ENDIAN "Actuator testing command. This is similar to MAV_CMD_DO_MOTOR_TEST but operates on the level of o..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 310 310 310 "MAV_CMD_ACTUATOR_TEST"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER VALUE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Output value: 1 means maximum positive output, 0 to center servos or minimum ..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER TIMEOUT 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Timeout after which the test command expires and the output is restored to th..."
    UNITS "Seconds" s
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER OUTPUT_FUNCTION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Actuator Output function"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# CONFIGURE_ACTUATOR (MAV_CMD 311)
# Actuator configuration command.
# ============================================================================
