  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 311 311 311 "MAV_CMD_CONFIGURE_ACTUATOR"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIGURATION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Actuator configuration action"
    STATE ACTUATOR_CONFIGURATION_NONE 0
    STATE ACTUATOR_CONFIGURATION_BEEP 1
    STATE ACTUATOR_CONFIGURATION_3D_MODE_ON 2
    STATE ACTUATOR_CONFIGURATION_3D_MODE_OFF 3
    STATE ACTUATOR_CONFIGURATION_SPIN_DIRECTION1 4
    STATE ACTUATOR_CONFIGURATION_SPIN_DIRECTION2 5
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER OUTPUT_FUNCTION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Actuator Output function"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# COMPONENT_ARM_DISARM (MAV_CMD 400)
# Arms / Disarms a component
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> COMPONENT_ARM_DISARM LITTLE_ENDIAN "Arms / Disarms a component"
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 400 400 400 "MAV_CMD_COMPONENT_ARM_DISARM"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ARM 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Arm (MAV_BOOL_FALSE: disarm). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."
  APPEND_PARAMETER FORCE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "0: arm-disarm unless prevented by safety checks (i.e. when landed), 21196: fo..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "Arming enables the motors - ensure area is clear!"

# ============================================================================
# RUN_PREARM_CHECKS (MAV_CMD 401)
# Instructs a target system to run pre-arm checks.
# This allows preflight checks to be run on demand, which may be useful on
# systems that normally run them at low rate, or which do not trigger checks
# when the armable state might have changed.
# This command should return MAV_RESULT_ACCEPTED if it will run the checks.
# The results of the checks are usually then reported in SYS_STATUS messages
# (this is system-specific).
# The command should return MAV_RESULT_TEMPORARILY_REJECTED if the system is
# already armed.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> RUN_PREARM_CHECKS LITTLE_ENDIAN "Instructs a target system to run pre-arm checks. This allows preflight checks to be run on demand..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 401 401 401 "MAV_CMD_RUN_PREARM_CHECKS"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# ILLUMINATOR_ON_OFF (MAV_CMD 405)
# Turns illuminators ON/OFF. An illuminator is a light source that is used
# for lighting up dark areas external to the system: e.g. a torch or
# searchlight (as opposed to a light source for illuminating the system
# itself, e.g. an indicator light).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> ILLUMINATOR_ON_OFF LITTLE_ENDIAN "Turns illuminators ON/OFF. An illuminator is a light source that is used for lighting up dark are..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 405 405 405 "MAV_CMD_ILLUMINATOR_ON_OFF"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ENABLE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Illuminators on/off (MAV_BOOL_TRUE: illuminators on). Values not equal to 0 o..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_ILLUMINATOR_CONFIGURE (MAV_CMD 406)
# Configures illuminator settings. An illuminator is a light source that is
# used for lighting up dark areas external to the system: e.g. a torch or
# searchlight (as opposed to a light source for illuminating the system
# itself, e.g. an indicator light).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_ILLUMINATOR_CONFIGURE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Configures illuminator settings. An illuminator is a light source that is used for lighting up da..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 406 406 406 "MAV_CMD_DO_ILLUMINATOR_CONFIGURE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Mode"
    STATE ILLUMINATOR_MODE_UNKNOWN 0
    STATE ILLUMINATOR_MODE_INTERNAL_CONTROL 1
    STATE ILLUMINATOR_MODE_EXTERNAL_SYNC 2
  APPEND_PARAMETER BRIGHTNESS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "0%: Off, 100%: Max Brightness"
    UNITS "Percent" %
  APPEND_PARAMETER STROBE_PERIOD 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Strobe period in seconds where 0 means strobing is not used"
    UNITS "Seconds" s
  APPEND_PARAMETER STROBE_DUTY 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Strobe duty cycle where 100% means it is on constantly and 0 means strobing i..."
    UNITS "Percent" %
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# GET_HOME_POSITION (MAV_CMD 410)
# Request the home position from the vehicle.
# The vehicle will ACK the command and then emit the HOME_POSITION message.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> GET_HOME_POSITION LITTLE_ENDIAN "Request the home position from the vehicle. The vehicle will ACK the command and then emit the HO..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 410 410 410 "MAV_CMD_GET_HOME_POSITION"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# INJECT_FAILURE (MAV_CMD 420)
# Inject artificial failure for testing purposes. Note that autopilots
# should implement an additional protection before accepting this command
# such as a specific param setting.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> INJECT_FAILURE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Inject artificial failure for testing purposes. Note that autopilots should implement an addition..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 420 420 420 "MAV_CMD_INJECT_FAILURE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER FAILURE_UNIT 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The unit which is affected by the failure."
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_GYRO 0
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_ACCEL 1
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_MAG 2
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_BARO 3
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_GPS 4
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_OPTICAL_FLOW 5
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_VIO 6
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_DISTANCE_SENSOR 7
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_AIRSPEED 8
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SYSTEM_BATTERY 100
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SYSTEM_MOTOR 101
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SYSTEM_SERVO 102
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SYSTEM_AVOIDANCE 103
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SYSTEM_RC_SIGNAL 104
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SYSTEM_MAVLINK_SIGNAL 105
  APPEND_PARAMETER FAILURE_TYPE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The type how the failure manifests itself."
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_OK 0
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_OFF 1
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_STUCK 2
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_GARBAGE 3
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_WRONG 4
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_SLOW 5
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_DELAYED 6
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_INTERMITTENT 7
  APPEND_PARAMETER INSTANCE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Instance affected by failure (0 to signal all)."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# START_RX_PAIR (MAV_CMD 500)
# Starts receiver pairing.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> START_RX_PAIR LITTLE_ENDIAN "Starts receiver pairing."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 500 500 500 "MAV_CMD_START_RX_PAIR"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER RC_TYPE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "RC type."
    STATE RC_TYPE_SPEKTRUM 0
    STATE RC_TYPE_CRSF 1
  APPEND_PARAMETER RC_SUB_TYPE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "RC sub type."
    STATE RC_SUB_TYPE_SPEKTRUM_DSM2 0
    STATE RC_SUB_TYPE_SPEKTRUM_DSMX 1
    STATE RC_SUB_TYPE_SPEKTRUM_DSMX8 2
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# GET_MESSAGE_INTERVAL (MAV_CMD 510)
# Request the interval between messages for a particular MAVLink message ID.
# The receiver should ACK the command and then emit its response in a
# MESSAGE_INTERVAL message.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> GET_MESSAGE_INTERVAL LITTLE_ENDIAN "Request the interval between messages for a particular MAVLink message ID. The receiver should AC..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 510 510 510 "MAV_CMD_GET_MESSAGE_INTERVAL"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER MESSAGE_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The MAVLink message ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER MESSAGE_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The MAVLink message ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER INTERVAL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The interval between two messages. -1: disable. 0: request default rate (whic..."
    UNITS "Microseconds" us
  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Use for index ID, if required. Otherwise, the use of this parameter (if any) ..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message...."
  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message...."
  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message...."
  APPEND_PARAMETER RESPONSE_TARGET 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target address of message stream (if message has target address fields). 0: F..."
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================

  APPEND_PARAMETER MESSAGE_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The MAVLink message ID of the requested message."
  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Use for index ID, if required. Otherwise, the use of this parameter (if any) ..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message...."
  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message...."
  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message...."
  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message...."
  APPEND_PARAMETER RESPONSE_TARGET 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target address for requested message (if message has target address fields). ..."
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# REQUEST_PROTOCOL_VERSION (MAV_CMD 519)

# the command and then emit their capabilities in an PROTOCOL_VERSION
# message
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> REQUEST_PROTOCOL_VERSION LITTLE_ENDIAN "Request MAVLink protocol version compatibility. All receivers should ACK the command and then emi..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PROTOCOL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Request supported protocol versions by all nodes on the network (MAV_BOOL_TRU..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (all remaining params)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (all remaining params)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

# ============================================================================
# STORAGE_FORMAT (MAV_CMD 526)
# Format a storage medium. Once format is complete, a STORAGE_INFORMATION
# message is sent. Use the command's target_component to target a specific
# component's storage.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> STORAGE_FORMAT LITTLE_ENDIAN "Format a storage medium. Once format is complete, a STORAGE_INFORMATION message is sent. Use the ..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 526 526 526 "MAV_CMD_STORAGE_FORMAT"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER STORAGE_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Storage ID (1 for first, 2 for second, etc.)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER FORMAT 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Format storage (and reset image log). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."
  APPEND_PARAMETER RESET_IMAGE_LOG 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reset Image Log (without formatting storage medium). This will reset CAMERA_C..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (all remaining params)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# SET_CAMERA_MODE (MAV_CMD 530)
# Set camera running mode. Use NaN for reserved values. GCS will send a
# MAV_CMD_REQUEST_VIDEO_STREAM_STATUS command after a mode change if the
# camera supports video streaming.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SET_CAMERA_MODE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Set camera running mode. Use NaN for reserved values. GCS will send a MAV_CMD_REQUEST_VIDEO_STREA..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 530 530 530 "MAV_CMD_SET_CAMERA_MODE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras a..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER CAMERA_MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Camera mode"
    STATE CAMERA_MODE_IMAGE 0
    STATE CAMERA_MODE_VIDEO 1
    STATE CAMERA_MODE_IMAGE_SURVEY 2
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# SET_CAMERA_ZOOM (MAV_CMD 531)
# Set camera zoom. Camera must respond with a CAMERA_SETTINGS message (on
# success).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SET_CAMERA_ZOOM LITTLE_ENDIAN "Set camera zoom. Camera must respond with a CAMERA_SETTINGS message (on success)."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 531 531 531 "MAV_CMD_SET_CAMERA_ZOOM"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ZOOM_TYPE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Zoom type"
    STATE ZOOM_TYPE_STEP 0
    STATE ZOOM_TYPE_CONTINUOUS 1
    STATE ZOOM_TYPE_RANGE 2
    STATE ZOOM_TYPE_FOCAL_LENGTH 3
    STATE ZOOM_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_FOV 4
  APPEND_PARAMETER ZOOM_VALUE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Zoom value. The range of valid values depend on the zoom type."
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras a..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# SET_CAMERA_FOCUS (MAV_CMD 532)
# Set camera focus. Camera must respond with a CAMERA_SETTINGS message (on
# success).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SET_CAMERA_FOCUS LITTLE_ENDIAN "Set camera focus. Camera must respond with a CAMERA_SETTINGS message (on success)."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 532 532 532 "MAV_CMD_SET_CAMERA_FOCUS"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER FOCUS_TYPE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Focus type"
    STATE FOCUS_TYPE_STEP 0
    STATE FOCUS_TYPE_CONTINUOUS 1
    STATE FOCUS_TYPE_RANGE 2
    STATE FOCUS_TYPE_METERS 3
    STATE FOCUS_TYPE_AUTO 4
    STATE FOCUS_TYPE_AUTO_SINGLE 5
    STATE FOCUS_TYPE_AUTO_CONTINUOUS 6
  APPEND_PARAMETER FOCUS_VALUE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Focus value"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras a..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# SET_STORAGE_USAGE (MAV_CMD 533)
# Set that a particular storage is the preferred location for saving photos,
# videos, and/or other media (e.g. to set that an SD card is used for
# storing videos).
# There can only be one preferred save location for each particular media
# type: setting a media usage flag will clear/reset that same flag if set on
# any other storage.
# If no flag is set the system should use its default storage.
# A target system can choose to always use default storage, in which case it
# should ACK the command with MAV_RESULT_UNSUPPORTED.
# A target system can choose to not allow a particular storage to be set as
# preferred storage, in which case it should ACK the command with
# MAV_RESULT_DENIED.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SET_STORAGE_USAGE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Set that a particular storage is the preferred location for saving photos, videos, and/or other m..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 533 533 533 "MAV_CMD_SET_STORAGE_USAGE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER STORAGE_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Storage ID (1 for first, 2 for second, etc.)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER USAGE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Usage flags"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# SET_CAMERA_SOURCE (MAV_CMD 534)
# Set camera source. Changes the camera's active sources on cameras with
# multiple image sensors.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SET_CAMERA_SOURCE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Set camera source. Changes the camera's active sources on cameras with multiple image sensors."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 534 534 534 "MAV_CMD_SET_CAMERA_SOURCE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER DEVICE_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Component Id of camera to address or 1-6 for non-MAVLink cameras, 0 for all c..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PRIMARY_SOURCE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Primary Source"
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_DEFAULT 0
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_RGB 1
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_IR 2
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_NDVI 3
  APPEND_PARAMETER SECONDARY_SOURCE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Secondary Source. If non-zero the second source will be displayed as picture-..."
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_DEFAULT 0
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_RGB 1
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_IR 2
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_NDVI 3
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 600 600 600 "MAV_CMD_JUMP_TAG"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TAG 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Tag."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

# ============================================================================
# DO_JUMP_TAG (MAV_CMD 601)
# Jump to the matching tag in the mission list. Repeat this action for the
# specified number of times. A mission should contain a single matching tag
# for each jump. If this is not the case then a jump to a missing tag should
# complete the mission, and a jump where there are multiple matching tags
# should always select the one with the lowest mission sequence number.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_JUMP_TAG LITTLE_ENDIAN "Jump to the matching tag in the mission list. Repeat this action for the specified number of time..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 601 601 601 "MAV_CMD_DO_JUMP_TAG"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TAG 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target tag to jump to."
  APPEND_PARAMETER REPEAT 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Repeat count."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_GIMBAL_MANAGER_PITCHYAW (MAV_CMD 1000)
# Set gimbal manager pitch/yaw setpoints (low rate command). It is possible
# to set combinations of the values below. E.g. an angle as well as a
# desired angular rate can be used to get to this angle at a certain angular
# rate, or an angular rate only will result in continuous turning. NaN is to
# be used to signal unset. Note: only the gimbal manager will react to this
# command - it will be ignored by a gimbal device. Use
# GIMBAL_MANAGER_SET_PITCHYAW if you need to stream pitch/yaw setpoints at
# higher rate.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_GIMBAL_MANAGER_PITCHYAW LITTLE_ENDIAN "Set gimbal manager pitch/yaw setpoints (low rate command). It is possible to set combinations of ..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 1000 1000 1000 "MAV_CMD_DO_GIMBAL_MANAGER_PITCHYAW"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PITCH_ANGLE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Pitch angle (positive to pitch up, relative to vehicle for FOLLOW mode, relat..."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW_ANGLE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Yaw angle (positive to yaw to the right, relative to vehicle for FOLLOW mode,..."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER PITCH_RATE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Pitch rate (positive to pitch up)."
    UNITS "Degrees_per_second" deg/s
  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW_RATE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Yaw rate (positive to yaw to the right)."
    UNITS "Degrees_per_second" deg/s
  APPEND_PARAMETER GIMBAL_MANAGER_FLAGS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Gimbal manager flags to use."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER GIMBAL_DEVICE_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Component ID of gimbal device to address (or 1-6 for non-MAVLink gimbal), 0 f..."
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_GIMBAL_MANAGER_CONFIGURE (MAV_CMD 1001)
# Gimbal configuration to set which sysid/compid is in primary and secondary
# control.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_GIMBAL_MANAGER_CONFIGURE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Gimbal configuration to set which sysid/compid is in primary and secondary control."

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 1001 1001 1001 "MAV_CMD_DO_GIMBAL_MANAGER_CONFIGURE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER SYSID_PRIMARY_CONTROL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Sysid for primary control (0: no one in control, -1: leave unchanged, -2: set..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPID_PRIMARY_CONTROL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Compid for primary control (0: no one in control, -1: leave unchanged, -2: se..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER SYSID_SECONDARY_CONTROL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Sysid for secondary control (0: no one in control, -1: leave unchanged, -2: s..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPID_SECONDARY_CONTROL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Compid for secondary control (0: no one in control, -1: leave unchanged, -2: ..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER GIMBAL_DEVICE_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Component ID of gimbal device to address (or 1-6 for non-MAVLink gimbal), 0 f..."
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# IMAGE_START_CAPTURE (MAV_CMD 2000)
# Start image capture sequence. CAMERA_IMAGE_CAPTURED must be emitted after
# each capture.
# Param1 (id) may be used to specify the target camera: 0: all cameras, 1 to
# 6: autopilot-connected cameras, 7-255: MAVLink camera component ID.
# It is needed in order to target specific cameras connected to the
# autopilot, or specific sensors in a multi-sensor camera (neither of which
# have a distinct MAVLink component ID).
# It is also needed to specify the target camera in missions.
# When used in a mission, an autopilot should execute the MAV_CMD for a
# specified local camera (param1 = 1-6), or resend it as a command if it is
# intended for a MAVLink camera (param1 = 7 - 255), setting the command's
# target_component as the param1 value (and setting param1 in the command to
# zero).
# If the param1 is 0 the autopilot should do both.
# When sent in a command the target MAVLink address is set using
# target_component.
# If addressed specifically to an autopilot: param1 should be used in the
# same way as it is for missions (though command should NACK with
# MAV_RESULT_DENIED if a specified local camera does not exist).
# If addressed to a MAVLink camera, param 1 can be used to address all
# cameras (0), or to separately address 1 to 7 individual sensors. Other
# values should be NACKed with MAV_RESULT_DENIED.
# If the command is broadcast (target_component is 0) then param 1 should be
# set to 0 (any other value should be NACKED with MAV_RESULT_DENIED). An
# autopilot would trigger any local cameras and forward the command to all
# channels.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> IMAGE_START_CAPTURE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Start image capture sequence. CAMERA_IMAGE_CAPTURED must be emitted after each capture. Param1 (i..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2000 2000 2000 "MAV_CMD_IMAGE_START_CAPTURE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras a..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER INTERVAL 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Desired elapsed time between two consecutive pictures (in seconds). Minimum v..."
    UNITS "Seconds" s
  APPEND_PARAMETER TOTAL_IMAGES 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Total number of images to capture. 0 to capture forever/until MAV_CMD_IMAGE_S..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER SEQUENCE_NUMBER 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Capture sequence number starting from 1. This is only valid for single-captur..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# IMAGE_STOP_CAPTURE (MAV_CMD 2001)
# Stop image capture sequence.
# Param1 (id) may be used to specify the target camera: 0: all cameras, 1 to
# 6: autopilot-connected cameras, 7-255: MAVLink camera component ID.
# It is needed in order to target specific cameras connected to the
# autopilot, or specific sensors in a multi-sensor camera (neither of which
# have a distinct MAVLink component ID).
# It is also needed to specify the target camera in missions.
# When used in a mission, an autopilot should execute the MAV_CMD for a
# specified local camera (param1 = 1-6), or resend it as a command if it is
# intended for a MAVLink camera (param1 = 7 - 255), setting the command's
# target_component as the param1 value (and setting param1 in the command to
# zero).
# If the param1 is 0 the autopilot should do both.
# When sent in a command the target MAVLink address is set using
# target_component.
# If addressed specifically to an autopilot: param1 should be used in the
# same way as it is for missions (though command should NACK with
# MAV_RESULT_DENIED if a specified local camera does not exist).
# If addressed to a MAVLink camera, param1 can be used to address all
# cameras (0), or to separately address 1 to 7 individual sensors. Other
# values should be NACKed with MAV_RESULT_DENIED.
# If the command is broadcast (target_component is 0) then param 1 should be
# set to 0 (any other value should be NACKED with MAV_RESULT_DENIED). An
# autopilot would trigger any local cameras and forward the command to all
# channels.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> IMAGE_STOP_CAPTURE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Stop image capture sequence. Param1 (id) may be used to specify the target camera: 0: all cameras..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2001 2001 2001 "MAV_CMD_IMAGE_STOP_CAPTURE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras a..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# REQUEST_CAMERA_IMAGE_CAPTURE (MAV_CMD 2002)
# Re-request a CAMERA_IMAGE_CAPTURED message.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> REQUEST_CAMERA_IMAGE_CAPTURE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Re-request a CAMERA_IMAGE_CAPTURED message."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2002 2002 2002 "MAV_CMD_REQUEST_CAMERA_IMAGE_CAPTURE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER NUMBER 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Sequence number for missing CAMERA_IMAGE_CAPTURED message"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_TRIGGER_CONTROL (MAV_CMD 2003)
# Enable or disable on-board camera triggering system.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_TRIGGER_CONTROL LITTLE_ENDIAN "Enable or disable on-board camera triggering system."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2003 2003 2003 "MAV_CMD_DO_TRIGGER_CONTROL"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ENABLE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Trigger enable/disable (0 for disable, 1 for start), -1 to ignore"
  APPEND_PARAMETER RESET 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "1 to reset the trigger sequence, -1 or 0 to ignore"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PAUSE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "1 to pause triggering, but without switching the camera off or retracting it...."
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras a..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# CAMERA_TRACK_POINT (MAV_CMD 2004)
# If the camera supports point visual tracking
# (CAMERA_CAP_FLAGS_HAS_TRACKING_POINT is set), this command allows to
# initiate the tracking.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> CAMERA_TRACK_POINT LITTLE_ENDIAN "If the camera supports point visual tracking (CAMERA_CAP_FLAGS_HAS_TRACKING_POINT is set), this c..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2004 2004 2004 "MAV_CMD_CAMERA_TRACK_POINT"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER POINT_X 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Point to track x value (normalized 0..1, 0 is left, 1 is right)."
  APPEND_PARAMETER POINT_Y 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Point to track y value (normalized 0..1, 0 is top, 1 is bottom)."
  APPEND_PARAMETER RADIUS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Point radius (normalized 0..1, 0 is one pixel, 1 is full image width)."
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras a..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# CAMERA_TRACK_RECTANGLE (MAV_CMD 2005)

# (CAMERA_CAP_FLAGS_HAS_TRACKING_RECTANGLE is set), this command allows to
# initiate the tracking.

  APPEND_PARAMETER TOP_LEFT_CORNER_Y 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Top left corner of rectangle y value (normalized 0..1, 0 is top, 1 is bottom)."
  APPEND_PARAMETER BOTTOM_RIGHT_CORNER_X 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Bottom right corner of rectangle x value (normalized 0..1, 0 is left, 1 is ri..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER BOTTOM_RIGHT_CORNER_Y 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Bottom right corner of rectangle y value (normalized 0..1, 0 is top, 1 is bot..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras a..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# CAMERA_STOP_TRACKING (MAV_CMD 2010)
# Stops ongoing tracking.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> CAMERA_STOP_TRACKING LITTLE_ENDIAN "Stops ongoing tracking."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2010 2010 2010 "MAV_CMD_CAMERA_STOP_TRACKING"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras a..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# VIDEO_START_CAPTURE (MAV_CMD 2500)
# Starts video capture (recording).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> VIDEO_START_CAPTURE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Starts video capture (recording)."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2500 2500 2500 "MAV_CMD_VIDEO_START_CAPTURE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER STREAM_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Video Stream ID (0 for all streams)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER STATUS_FREQUENCY 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Frequency CAMERA_CAPTURE_STATUS messages should be sent while recording (0 fo..."
    UNITS "Hertz" Hz
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras a..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2800 2800 2800 "MAV_CMD_PANORAMA_CREATE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

    UNITS "Degrees" deg

    UNITS "Degrees" deg

    UNITS "Degrees_per_second" deg/s
  APPEND_PARAMETER VERTICAL_SPEED 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Speed of the vertical rotation."
    UNITS "Degrees_per_second" deg/s

  APPEND_PARAMETER STATE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The target VTOL state. For normal transitions, only MAV_VTOL_STATE_MC and MAV..."
    STATE MAV_VTOL_STATE_UNDEFINED 0
    STATE MAV_VTOL_STATE_TRANSITION_TO_FW 1
    STATE MAV_VTOL_STATE_TRANSITION_TO_MC 2
    STATE MAV_VTOL_STATE_MC 3
    STATE MAV_VTOL_STATE_FW 4
  APPEND_PARAMETER IMMEDIATE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Force immediate transition to the specified MAV_VTOL_STATE. 1: Force immediat..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# ARM_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST (MAV_CMD 3001)
# Request authorization to arm the vehicle to a external entity, the arm
# authorizer is responsible to request all data that is needs from the
# vehicle before authorize or deny the request.
# If approved the COMMAND_ACK message progress field should be set with
# period of time that this authorization is valid in seconds.
# If the authorization is denied COMMAND_ACK.result_param2 should be set
# with one of the reasons in ARM_AUTH_DENIED_REASON.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> ARM_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST LITTLE_ENDIAN "Request authorization to arm the vehicle to a external entity, the arm authorizer is responsible ..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 3001 3001 3001 "MAV_CMD_ARM_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER SYSTEM_ID 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Vehicle system id, this way ground station can request arm authorization on b..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# SET_GUIDED_SUBMODE_STANDARD (MAV_CMD 4000)
# This command sets the submode to standard guided when vehicle is in guided
# mode. The vehicle holds position and altitude and the user can input the
# desired velocities along all three axes.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SET_GUIDED_SUBMODE_STANDARD LITTLE_ENDIAN "This command sets the submode to standard guided when vehicle is in guided mode. The vehicle hold..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 4000 4000 4000 "MAV_CMD_SET_GUIDED_SUBMODE_STANDARD"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# SET_GUIDED_SUBMODE_CIRCLE (MAV_CMD 4001)
# This command sets submode circle when vehicle is in guided mode. Vehicle
# flies along a circle facing the center of the circle. The user can input
# the velocity along the circle and change the radius. If no input is given
# the vehicle will hold position.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SET_GUIDED_SUBMODE_CIRCLE LITTLE_ENDIAN "This command sets submode circle when vehicle is in guided mode. Vehicle flies along a circle fac..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 4001 4001 4001 "MAV_CMD_SET_GUIDED_SUBMODE_CIRCLE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER RADIUS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Radius of desired circle in CIRCLE_MODE"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target latitude of center of circle in CIRCLE_MODE"
    UNITS "Degrees_E7" degE7
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Target longitude of center of circle in CIRCLE_MODE"
    UNITS "Degrees_E7" degE7
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# CONDITION_GATE (MAV_CMD 4501)
# Delay mission state machine until gate has been reached.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> CONDITION_GATE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Delay mission state machine until gate has been reached."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 4501 4501 4501 "MAV_CMD_CONDITION_GATE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER GEOMETRY 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Geometry: 0: orthogonal to path between previous and next waypoint."
  APPEND_PARAMETER USEALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Use altitude (MAV_BOOL_FALSE: ignore altitude). Values not equal to 0 or 1 ar..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_FENCE_RETURN_POINT (MAV_CMD 5000)
# Fence return point (there can only be one such point in a geofence
# definition). If rally points are supported they should be used instead.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_FENCE_RETURN_POINT LITTLE_ENDIAN "Fence return point (there can only be one such point in a geofence definition). If rally points a..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 5000 5000 5000 "MAV_CMD_NAV_FENCE_RETURN_POINT"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_FENCE_POLYGON_VERTEX_INCLUSION (MAV_CMD 5001)
# Fence vertex for an inclusion polygon (the polygon must not be
# self-intersecting). The vehicle must stay within this area. Minimum of 3
# vertices required.
# The vertices for a polygon must be sent sequentially, each with param1 set
# to the total number of vertices in the polygon.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_FENCE_POLYGON_VERTEX_INCLUSION LITTLE_ENDIAN "Fence vertex for an inclusion polygon (the polygon must not be self-intersecting). The vehicle mu..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 5001 5001 5001 "MAV_CMD_NAV_FENCE_POLYGON_VERTEX_INCLUSION"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER VERTEX_COUNT 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Polygon vertex count. This is the number of vertices in the current polygon (..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER INCLUSION_GROUP 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Vehicle must be inside ALL inclusion zones in a single group, vehicle must be..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_FENCE_POLYGON_VERTEX_EXCLUSION (MAV_CMD 5002)
# Fence vertex for an exclusion polygon (the polygon must not be
# self-intersecting). The vehicle must stay outside this area. Minimum of 3
# vertices required.
# The vertices for a polygon must be sent sequentially, each with param1 set
# to the total number of vertices in the polygon.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_FENCE_POLYGON_VERTEX_EXCLUSION LITTLE_ENDIAN "Fence vertex for an exclusion polygon (the polygon must not be self-intersecting). The vehicle mu..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 5002 5002 5002 "MAV_CMD_NAV_FENCE_POLYGON_VERTEX_EXCLUSION"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER VERTEX_COUNT 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Polygon vertex count. This is the number of vertices in the current polygon (..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================

    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER INCLUSION_GROUP 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Vehicle must be inside ALL inclusion zones in a single group, vehicle must be..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# UAVCAN_GET_NODE_INFO (MAV_CMD 5200)
# Commands the vehicle to respond with a sequence of messages
# UAVCAN_NODE_INFO, one message per every UAVCAN node that is online. Note
# that some of the response messages can be lost, which the receiver can
# detect easily by checking whether every received UAVCAN_NODE_STATUS has a
# matching message UAVCAN_NODE_INFO received earlier; if not, this command
# should be sent again in order to request re-transmission of the node
# information messages.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> UAVCAN_GET_NODE_INFO LITTLE_ENDIAN "Commands the vehicle to respond with a sequence of messages UAVCAN_NODE_INFO, one message per eve..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 5200 5200 5200 "MAV_CMD_UAVCAN_GET_NODE_INFO"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_SAFETY_SWITCH_STATE (MAV_CMD 5300)
# Change state of safety switch.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_SAFETY_SWITCH_STATE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Change state of safety switch."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 5300 5300 5300 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_SAFETY_SWITCH_STATE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER DESIRED_STATE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "New safety switch state."
    STATE SAFETY_SWITCH_STATE_SAFE 0
    STATE SAFETY_SWITCH_STATE_DANGEROUS 1
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_ADSB_OUT_IDENT (MAV_CMD 10001)
# Trigger the start of an ADSB-out IDENT. This should only be used when
# requested to do so by an Air Traffic Controller in controlled airspace.
# This starts the IDENT which is then typically held for 18 seconds by the
# hardware per the Mode A, C, and S transponder spec.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_ADSB_OUT_IDENT LITTLE_ENDIAN "Trigger the start of an ADSB-out IDENT. This should only be used when requested to do so by an Ai..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 10001 10001 10001 "MAV_CMD_DO_ADSB_OUT_IDENT"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved (set to 0)"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# PAYLOAD_PREPARE_DEPLOY (MAV_CMD 30001)
# Deploy payload on a Lat / Lon / Alt position. This includes the navigation
# to reach the required release position and velocity.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> PAYLOAD_PREPARE_DEPLOY LITTLE_ENDIAN "Deploy payload on a Lat / Lon / Alt position. This includes the navigation to reach the required ..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 30001 30001 30001 "MAV_CMD_PAYLOAD_PREPARE_DEPLOY"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER OPERATION_MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Operation mode. 0: prepare single payload deploy (overwriting previous reques..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER APPROACH_VECTOR 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Desired approach vector in compass heading. A negative value indicates the sy..."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER GROUND_SPEED 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Desired ground speed at release time. This can be overridden by the airframe ..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE_CLEARANCE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Minimum altitude clearance to the release position. A negative value indicate..."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude."
    UNITS "Degrees_E7" degE7
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude."
    UNITS "Degrees_E7" degE7
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude (MSL)"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# PAYLOAD_CONTROL_DEPLOY (MAV_CMD 30002)

# ============================================================================

  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 30002 30002 30002 "MAV_CMD_PAYLOAD_CONTROL_DEPLOY"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER OPERATION_MODE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Operation mode. 0: Abort deployment, continue normal mission. 1: switch to pa..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Reserved"
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# WAYPOINT_USER_1 (MAV_CMD 31000)
# User defined waypoint item. Ground Station will show the Vehicle as flying
# through this item.
# ============================================================================

  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 31000 31000 31000 "MAV_CMD_WAYPOINT_USER_1"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude unscaled"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude unscaled"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude (MSL)"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# SPATIAL_USER_1 (MAV_CMD 31005)
# User defined spatial item. Ground Station will not show the Vehicle as
# flying through this item. Example: ROI item.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SPATIAL_USER_1 LITTLE_ENDIAN "User defined spatial item. Ground Station will not show the Vehicle as flying through this item. ..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 31005 31005 31005 "MAV_CMD_SPATIAL_USER_1"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude unscaled"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude unscaled"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude (MSL)"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# SPATIAL_USER_2 (MAV_CMD 31006)
# User defined spatial item. Ground Station will not show the Vehicle as

# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SPATIAL_USER_2 LITTLE_ENDIAN "User defined spatial item. Ground Station will not show the Vehicle as flying through this item. ..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 31006 31006 31006 "MAV_CMD_SPATIAL_USER_2"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude unscaled"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude unscaled"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude (MSL)"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# SPATIAL_USER_3 (MAV_CMD 31007)
# User defined spatial item. Ground Station will not show the Vehicle as
# flying through this item. Example: ROI item.
# ============================================================================

  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 31007 31007 31007 "MAV_CMD_SPATIAL_USER_3"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "User defined"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude unscaled"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude unscaled"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude (MSL)"
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
