# ============================================================================
# CAN_FORWARD (MAV_CMD 32000)
# Request forwarding of CAN packets from the given CAN bus to this
# component. CAN Frames are sent using CAN_FRAME and CANFD_FRAME messages
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> CAN_FORWARD LITTLE_ENDIAN "Request forwarding of CAN packets from the given CAN bus to this component. CAN Frames are sent u..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 32000 32000 32000 "MAV_CMD_CAN_FORWARD"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER BUS 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Bus number (0 to disable forwarding, 1 for first bus, 2 for 2nd bus, 3 for 3r..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# FIXED_MAG_CAL_YAW (MAV_CMD 42006)
# Magnetometer calibration based on provided known yaw. This allows for fast
# calibration using WMM field tables in the vehicle, given only the known
# yaw of the vehicle. If Latitude and longitude are both zero then use the
# current vehicle location.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> FIXED_MAG_CAL_YAW LITTLE_ENDIAN "Magnetometer calibration based on provided known yaw. This allows for fast calibration using WMM ..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 42006 42006 42006 "MAV_CMD_FIXED_MAG_CAL_YAW"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Yaw of vehicle in earth frame."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPASSMASK 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "CompassMask, 0 for all."
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_WINCH (MAV_CMD 42600)
# Command to operate winch.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_WINCH LITTLE_ENDIAN "Command to operate winch."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 42600 42600 42600 "MAV_CMD_DO_WINCH"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER INSTANCE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Winch instance number."
  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTION 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Action to perform."
    STATE WINCH_RELAXED 0
    STATE WINCH_RELATIVE_LENGTH_CONTROL 1
    STATE WINCH_RATE_CONTROL 2
    STATE WINCH_LOCK 3
    STATE WINCH_DELIVER 4
    STATE WINCH_HOLD 5
    STATE WINCH_RETRACT 6
    STATE WINCH_LOAD_LINE 7
    STATE WINCH_ABANDON_LINE 8
    STATE WINCH_LOAD_PAYLOAD 9
  APPEND_PARAMETER LENGTH 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Length of line to release (negative to wind)."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  APPEND_PARAMETER RATE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Release rate (negative to wind)."
    UNITS "Meters_per_second" m/s
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty."
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# EXTERNAL_POSITION_ESTIMATE (MAV_CMD 43003)
# Provide an external position estimate for use when dead-reckoning. This is
# meant to be used for occasional position resets that may be provided by a
# external system such as a remote pilot using landmarks over a video link.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> EXTERNAL_POSITION_ESTIMATE LITTLE_ENDIAN "Provide an external position estimate for use when dead-reckoning. This is meant to be used for o..."
  <%= render '_mavlink_v2_header_cmd.txt', locals: {msgid: 76, payload_len: 33} %>
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target system ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 0 255 1 "Target component ID"
  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 43003 43003 43003 "MAV_CMD_EXTERNAL_POSITION_ESTIMATE"
  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 255 0 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"
  APPEND_PARAMETER TRANSMISSION_TIME 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Timestamp that this message was sent as a time in the transmitters time domai..."
    UNITS "Seconds" s
  APPEND_PARAMETER PROCESSING_TIME 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "The time spent in processing the sensor data that is the basis for this posit..."
    UNITS "Seconds" s
  APPEND_PARAMETER ACCURACY 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "estimated one standard deviation accuracy of the measurement. Set to NaN if n..."
  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Empty"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Latitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Longitude"
  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT MIN MAX 0.0 "Altitude, not used. Should be sent as NaN. May be supported in a future versi..."
    UNITS "Meters" m
  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
